name: freeze-shock
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
On the second turn, the user hits the
target with electrically charged ice.
It may leave the target with paralysis.
